newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - Ocean County, N.J..
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - Ocean County, N.J..

text.p: SEALED PROPOSALS will be received, publicly opened and announced by the Comptroller of the County of Ocean (the County''), at the County Administration Building, on
until 11:00 a.m., for the purchase of the $672,000 College Capital Improvement Bonds, Series 1997 of the County
maturing on June 15 in the principal amounts set forth below:

All bidders for the Bonds must be participants of The Depository Trust Company, New York, New York (DTC''), or affiliated with its participants. Individual purchases may be made in the principal amount of $1,000 or any multiple thereof through book entries made on the books and records of DTC and its participants. The Bonds will be delivered on or about June 19, 1997 at the offices of the County's bond counsel, DeCotiis, FitzPatrick & Gluck, in Toms River, New Jersey.

The Bonds will be dated as of June 15, 1997 and will bear interest at the rate or rates of interest per annum, in multiples of 1/8 or 1/20 of 1%, specified by the successful bidder, payable on December 15, 1997 and semiannually thereafter on the fifteenth day of June and December in each year until maturity. The proposed rate or rates of interest to be borne by the Bonds shall not exceed 6.5% per annum. The Bonds are not subject to redemption prior to maturity. The Bonds shall be entitled to the benefits of Chapter 12 of the Laws of New Jersey of 1971, and the acts amendatory thereof and supplemental thereto. The Bonds will be awarded to the bidder on whose bid the total loan may be made at the lowest net interest cost, in accordance with the terms of the sale.

A complete Notice of Sale containing the full terms of sale and the Preliminary Official Statement have each been prepared and may be obtained from the County's financial advisor, Altman & Co., 11 Pinewood Court, Short Hills, NJ 07078 (201/376-8916) Attention: Vivian Altman.
